metadata.title: USN-4176-1 -- GNU cpio vulnerability
metadata.description: Thomas Habets discovered that GNU cpio incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to privilege escalation.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4176-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  cpio - 2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
